title: Daddy's Pasta
description: Daddyâ€™s Pasta is made using a rich meaty tomato sauce with free range beef and pork, slowly simmered with organic courgettes, lentils, onions and carrots. This is combined with whole grain fusilli and topped with a cheese and bread crumb.

title: Veggie Dhal
description: Our aromatic Vegetable Dhal is made using organic red lentils, cauliflower, sweet potatoes, spinach and calvolo nero. All seasoned with turmeric, cumin and garlic cooked in a homemade vegetable stock.

title: Green Mac and Cheese
description: Green Mac and Cheese uses macaroni pasta combined with a rich creamy cheese sauce. The sauce is jam packed with green vegetables including organic broccoli, spinach and leeks.

title: Lasagna
description: Our Lasagna is cooked in a rich meaty tomato sauce using free range beef and pork, layered with a creamy white sauce. We use macaroni pasta, and the tomato sauce is cooked with organic carrots, onions and courgettes

title: Veggie Shepherd's Pie
description: Our Vegetable Shepherd's Pie is a lovely homely dish. Organic carrots, lentils, tomatoes and onions slowly simmered in a lovely homemade vegetable stock. This is then topped with mashed organic sweet potatoes and thyme.
